>    [junit] Tests run: 5, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 1.297
>sec

>org.archive.crawler.datamodel.settings.XMLSettingsHandlerTest FAILED

>File...... file:/root/.maven/plugins/maven-test-pl
>ugin-1.5/plugin.jelly

>everything java related so complicated?!  
>

>
Sorry.  Its a lot to bite off if you ain't swimming in it every day 
(Even then...).

>I'm new to this, and your comments are very appreciated.
>
>  
>
The way our build is written, it runs tests before it produces jars or 
distributions.

You don't want to just download the built binary and avoid the build 
altogether?

Unfortunately, I just tried a build with the 0.6.0 src using maven rc2 
and sun java and it worked so its hard for me to help.

Tell me more about your environment (maven version, java version, platform).

Yours,
St.Ack
